column6: Leaves Hair Feeling Clean with No Irritation
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
column14: I bought this particular brand because it is one of the few which does not have Sodium Laurel Sulphate in it, which causes irritation on my scalp.  Was pleasantly surprised that I could wash my hair without irritation The bonus is that my hair is clean, and feels fuller.  The scent is light, not overpowering, another plus.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020
column14: A bit pricey and wasn’t thrilled about the feeling left in my hair afterwards. I have extremely thick hair that needs more than recommended amount of conditioner so that could be why.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
column14: My hair has never felt better.  Have the shampoo and conditioner.  I’ve tried a lot of different shampoos since I let my hair go natural, salt and pepper.  Hey lost of complements.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
column14: Not as expected. I have previously used this product after purchasing from a salon. The shampoo was quite thick and made lather with good wash. This time I bought from amazon and the consistency is very thin with no lather. Would not recommend.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020
column14: I love this shampoo and it has a great smell. I feel like it cleans my hair really well

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2020
